Communist Party of the United States of America Records
Subseries VIII.C: Communist Party, USA Publications
Subseries VIII.C: Communist Party, USA Publications

The bulk of this subseries is devoted to records from International Publishers, Co. a publishing arm of the CPUSA, and from Political Affairs (formerly The Communist), a theoretical journal affiliated with the Party. Materials from International Publishers consist of correspondence to and from staff editors, including some correspondence of Alexander Trachtenberg, company founder. Records from Political Affairs are more varied, offering article drafts, correspondence, and files of various editors from the 1980s and 1990s, notably Joe Simms..
